verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> in <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G935>king,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G3097>wise<s%> men from the <S%G395>east<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G4226>Where<s%> is he that is <S%G5088>born<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews?<s%> for we have <S%G1492>seen<s%> his <S%G792>star<s%> in the <S%G395>east,<s%> and are <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> him.
When <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> these things, he was <S%G5015>troubled,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> with him.

And when he had <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> he <S%G4441>demanded<s%> of them <S%G4226>where<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should be <S%G1080>born.<s%>
And they <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, In <S%G965>Bethlehem<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea:<s%> for <S%G3779>thus<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> by the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%>

And you <S%G965>Bethlehem,<s%> in the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2455>Juda,<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> not the <S%G1646>least<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2232>princes<s%> of <S%G2455>Juda:<s%> for out of you shall <S%G1831>come<s%> a <S%G2233>Governor,<s%> that shall <S%G4165>rule<s%> my <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> when he had <S%G2977>privately<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G3097>wise<s%> men, <S%G198>inquired<s%> of them diligently <S%G3588>what<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> the <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G5316>appeared.<s%>

And he <S%G3992>sent<s%> them to <S%G965>Bethlehem,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4198>Go<s%> and <S%G1833>search<s%> <S%G199>diligently<s%> for the <S%G3813>young<s%> <S%G3813>child;<s%> and <S%G1875>when<s%> you have <S%G2147>found<s%> him, <S%G518>bring<s%> me <S%G518>word<s%> <S%G518>again,<s%> that I may <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> him <S%G2504>also.<s%>

When they had <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G935>king,<s%> they <S%G4198>departed;<s%> and, <S%G2400>see,<s%> the <S%G792>star,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> in the <S%G395>east,<s%> <S%G4254>went<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> them, <S%G2193>till<s%> it <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> the <S%G3813>young<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> was.
When they <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G792>star,<s%> they <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> with <S%G4970>exceeding<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy.<s%>

And when they were <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house,<s%> they <S%G2147>saw<s%> the <S%G3813>young<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> with <S%G3137>Mary<s%> his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G4098>down,<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him: and when they had <S%G455>opened<s%> their <S%G2344>treasures,<s%> they <S%G4374>presented<s%> to him <S%G1435>gifts;<s%> <S%G5557>gold,<s%> and frankincense <S%G3030><s%>and <S%G4666>myrrh.<s%>

And being <S%G5537>warned<s%> of God in a <S%G3677>dream<s%> that they should not <S%G344>return<s%> to <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> they <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> their own <S%G5561>country<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3598>way.<s%>

And when they were <S%G402>departed,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appears<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> in a <S%G3677>dream,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1453>Arise,<s%> and <S%G3880>take<s%> the <S%G3813>young<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> and his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> and be you <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> I <S%G2036>bring<s%> you <S%G2036>word:<s%> for <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> the <S%G3813>young<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> him.

When he <S%G1453>arose,<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G3813>young<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> and his <S%G3384>mother<s%> by <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G125>Egypt:<s%>

And was <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G5054>death<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod:<s%> that it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> by the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Out of <S%G125>Egypt<s%> have I <S%G2564>called<s%> my <S%G5207>son.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> that he was <S%G1702>mocked<s%> of the <S%G3097>wise<s%> men, was <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G2373>wroth,<s%> and <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G649>forth,<s%> and <S%G337>slew<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3816>children<s%> that were in <S%G965>Bethlehem,<s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> <S%G846>thereof,<s%> from <S%G1332>two<s%> <S%G1332>years<s%> <S%G1332>old<s%> and <S%G2736>under,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he had diligently <S%G198>inquired<s%> of the <S%G3097>wise<s%> men.
<S%G5119>Then<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> by <S%G2408>Jeremy<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

In <S%G4471>Rama<s%> was there a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G2355>lamentation,<s%> and <S%G2805>weeping,<s%> and <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3602>mourning,<s%> <S%G4478>Rachel<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> for her <S%G5043>children,<s%> and <S%G2309>would<s%> not be <S%G3870>comforted,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they are not.

But when <S%G2264>Herod<s%> was <S%G5053>dead,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appears<s%> in a <S%G3677>dream<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> in <S%G125>Egypt,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G1453>Arise,<s%> and <S%G3880>take<s%> the <S%G3813>young<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> and his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel:<s%> for they are <S%G2348>dead<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> the <S%G3813>young<s%> <S%G3813>child's<s%> <S%G5590>life.<s%>

And he <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G3880>took<s%> the <S%G3813>young<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> and his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

But when he <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G745>Archelaus<s%> did <S%G936>reign<s%> in <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> in the <S%G473>room<s%> of his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> he was <S%G5399>afraid<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1563>thither:<s%> notwithstanding, being <S%G5537>warned<s%> of God in a <S%G3677>dream,<s%> he <S%G402>turned<s%> <S%G402>aside<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the parts of <S%G1056>Galilee:<s%>

And he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2730>dwelled<s%> in a <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth:<s%> that it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> by the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> He shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> a <S%G3480>Nazarene.<s%>
